chunks.en: Why is being deeply in love and devoted called a 'simp' in today's society?
Isn't love supposed to be the purest, most passionate thing?
Why is the act of pursuing someone who doesn't reciprocate, a one-sided pursuit, now called 'simping'?
Love is only love if it's reciprocated.
'Simping' usually means a long-term lack of return, even lack of response.

Modern society is short on time and heavy on tasks. Everything is about efficiency and demanding returns, including love. It's hard to believe in 'sincerity can penetrate metal and stone' as the books say.
If netizens think you're not worth it, they'll call you a 'simp'.
If netizens disagree with you, they'll call you a contrarian.
If netizens think you use expensive things that they don't need, they'll accuse you of showing off.
Thinking about it carefully, these insults are really unreasonable. They don't recognize the diversity of people and values, and instead pursue self-centeredness and homogenization.
I've always been strongly against these practices.
'Simping' mainly refers to the behavior of losing self-esteem and humiliating oneself in the hope of moving the other party. In short, love yourself first.
The term 'simp' can be said to be quite accurate. Imagine a dog you know licking you wildly when it sees you, would you treat it like a person?

A corresponding example is a post a few days ago where the poster was allergic to cats, but his wife couldn't bear to give the cat away. This is because she didn't treat him like a person. Not to mention a wife, even if a roommate did this I would kick him out. That poster obviously didn't have the guts, he's a typical simp.
Because modern Chinese women aren't worth it.
Everything has a bottom line. Only people who are devoted but principled won't be called 'simps'.
'Simps' refers to people who give up their self-esteem and humiliate themselves.
And 'simps' are not necessarily devoted.
'Simping' is one-sided 'moving' after losing oneself, while deep affection is trust and respect after retaining oneself.
Because most people are not worth being deeply loved and devoted to.
Because many people have had the experience of 'one-sided pursuit', which resulted in failure, and therefore developed hatred for this behavior.
A one-way arrow of affection is what makes a 'simp'.
Pure love should be based on mutual emotional resonance, not one-sided sacrifice.
The 'goddess' sleeps with a handsome guy on their first meeting, and you, acting as an ATM, will never get to sleep with her.
Love yourself first before loving others. Some people love so humbly that they make themselves into nothing.
'Simps' have no bottom line.
'Deep affection and devotion' are beautiful qualities in 'love and marriage'.
'One-sided pursuit' may not even mean there is any relationship between two people.
If the other party acquiesces to your pursuit, this may be normal behavior during the consideration period, or it may be that they are just fishing.
If the other party is disgusted and you keep pestering them, it's called harassment.
If you know you're a backup, even a jack, and are still willing to be an ATM, this kind of worthless person can be called a 'simp', and they'll end up with nothing.
Working for a company for many years can be called being deeply in love and devoted.
Working for a company for many years without getting paid can be called 'simping'.
'Simping' is being a dog mainly because one loses one's independent personality. This has no necessary connection with being deeply in love and devoted.
Some people are called 'simps' because netizens are mean.
Some people are called 'simps' because they have lost their independent personality, and they are indeed 'simps'.
I often call someone a turtle in one post, and then say that men pursuing women can actively spend money, but I don't feel like I'm splitting, it's just a simple analysis of the specific situation.

chunks.en: A person who loses self-esteem, self-worth, and self-meaning in the process of pursuit, at this time, his soul is on all fours and becomes a dog. A woman waves her finger and softly says 'tsk tsk', which can awaken all his physical functions.
'Simping' is actually a manifestation of narcissism.
'Simps' have no self-respect...
'Simps' are getting all the girls, of course, the rest will have opinions.
